item.title: The Best 10 Playgrounds near Pasig City, Manila, Metro Manila, Philippines
item.dc:creator: james
item.content:encoded:
• 1. Active Fun, Indoor Playground4.3 (4 reviews)PlaygroundsTaguig City
    • Good for Kids
    “Active Fun is basically a huge playground, except that it has much more fun activities and…” more
  • 2. Valle Verde 1 Park4.5 (2 reviews)PlaygroundsParksPasig City“Situated in the middle of greenery, the playground features padded flooring and a nice jungle gym…” more
  • 3. Jump Yard4.0 (2 reviews)Kids ActivitiesPlaygroundsPasig CityClosed until Noon tomorrow“This was one of those few times I wish I bought a ticket for myself and joined my kid on the…” more
  • 4. Mahogany Park4.5 (2 reviews)ParksPlaygroundsMakati City“Their playground isn’t only built for kids, there’s even a section where you can “gym”, they built…” more
  • 5. Kidzville Play and Party Center3.0 (2 reviews)PlaygroundsMandaluyong CityClosed until 11:00 AM tomorrow
    • Good for Kids
    “Both the play area and the mini village are very well thought off. It’s a great place for kids…” more
  • 6. Active Fun Children’s Play and Party CentresVenues & Event SpacesPlaygroundsMandaluyong City
  • 7. Ball Pit4.0 (2 reviews)CafesPlaygrounds₱₱₱₱Makati CityClosed until 10:00 AM tomorrow
    • Good for Kids

  • 8. Cheeky Monkeys PlaylandPlaygroundsPasay City
  • 9. Fantasy CarouselPlaygroundsPasay City
    • Good for Kids
  • 10. Active FunPlaygroundsQuezon City
